XenotypeDef.label: Viltrumite
XenotypeDef.description: A race of warriors and planetary conquerors from the planet Viltrum. Gifted with superhuman strength, speed, stamina, endurance, senses, regeneration, nigh-invulnerability, decelerated aging, viltrumites are stronger than regular humans in all aspects.\n Due a complex balancing system located in their inner ears, Viltrumites have the ability to fly. However, when a Viltrumite's equilibrium in their ears is disturbed, mainly by frequency, it can cause extreme pain and may even possibly kill them.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A race of warriors and planetary conquerors from the planet Viltrum.
